content:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Punt Your weapon files 1d4x5 feet in a random direction (determined by the GM).

Melee
So much Blood You are sickened 3.

Ranged
Unintentional Move You are moved 10 feet in a random direction (determined by the GM). This movement triggers reactions.

Unarmed
It's so Sparkly! You are blinded until the end of your next turn.

Spell
name: Critical Fumble Deck #53
